review: Nice compact unit that we bought for traveling.  Sometimes it's a PITA to connect a laptop or tablet to the television in whatever hotel or condo we might be vacationing in or, as is typically the case, we cannot use the tablet for another purpose while one of us might be streaming a movie or vice versa.This solves that problem to a large extent and the set up was simple as can be.  Thanks Amazon!
